sentences.en: A lamb had and roasted together with unleavened bread, bitter herbs and other items.
sentences.cn: 他们要买一只羊烤了,还要准备无酵饼 、 苦菜和其他物品.

sentences.en: Become unleavened even as you are unleavened.
sentences.cn: 要成为无酵的,因为你是无酵的.

sentences.en: Eat nothing made with yeast . Wherever you live, you must eat unleavened bread.
sentences.cn: 20有酵的物, 你们都不可吃, 在你们一切住处要吃无酵饼.

sentences.en: Lk .22:7 And the day of Unleavened Bread came, on which the passover had to be sacrificed.
sentences.cn: 路二二7除酵节, 须宰逾越羊羔的那一天到了.

sentences.en: Lot prepared a meal for them, baking unleavened cakes, and they ate them.
sentences.cn: 罗得为他们准备饮食烤硬面饼给他们吃.

sentences.en: Passover and the feast of Unleavened bread were only two days away.
sentences.cn: 还有两天逾越节和无酵饼的盛宴就来到了.

sentences.en: The Celts used these bowls of unleavened bread to hold a variety of fillings, including – as I discover when Wood hands me a sample – a tasty mixture of smoked fish, leek, hazelnuts and cream.
sentences.cn: 凯尔特人用这种未发酵的面包“碗”来放各种各样的食物，我发现伍德今天放的食物就有很多，包括一种烟熏鱼、韭葱、榛子和奶油的混合物。

sentences.en: The Israelites the Passover at that time and the Feast of Unleavened Bread for seven days.
sentences.cn: 当时在耶路撒冷的以色列人守逾越节,又守除酵节七日.

sentences.en: The Israelites the Passover at that time andthe Feast of Unleavened Bread for seven days.
sentences.cn: 当时在耶路撒冷的以色列人守逾越节、又守除酵节七日.

sentences.en: The unleavened cakes at the Passover season are before Him.
sentences.cn: 逾越节用的无酵饼就在他面前.

sentences.en: Then came the day of unleavened bread, when the passover must be killed.
sentences.cn: 除酵节, 须宰逾越羊羔的那一天到了.

sentences.en: Unleavened bread is often simply flour mixed with water.
sentences.cn: 未经发酵而制成的面包经常只是由水和面粉混合制成的.

sentences.en: Ye shall eat nothing leavened ; in all your habitations shall ye eat unleavened bread.
sentences.cn: 20有酵的物,你们都不可吃; 在你们一切住处要吃无酵饼.

trans.tran_cn: 未经发酵的，没放酵粉的，未受激发的
trans.tran_en: unleavened bread is flat because it is not made with yeast
